Package com.brogrammers.agora.data

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DataManager
    Implements the basic data functions required to work on a list of questions and add questions, add answers, and add comments to the list of question objects.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CacheDataManager
    A Cache Data Manager to push and pull question, answer, and comment objects to the device.
    DeviceUser
    The DeviceUser is a specialized singleton instance of an Author, which represents the current user of an instance of the application and stores user settings.
    ESDataManager
    Elastic search networking module.
    OfflineQueue
    The OfflineQueue holds query items that need to be sent to the server but were not able to be sent because of connections issues.
    QueryItem
    QueryItem contains all the required information to make a server request.
    QuestionController
    Controller class for directing data to and from the views and data managers.
